bibl.title: More on P. Oxy. LXI 4096, Mythographus Homericus.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXI, 4096. Additions to or comments on Michael HASLAM's notes [On P. Oxy. LXI 4096, Mythographus Homericus, ZPE 110 (1996) pp. 115-117] and remarks on readings, the most significant at fr. 11, 26 and 48. Further remarks will be published in the author's dissertation (forthcoming).
VAN ROSSUM-STEENBEEK Monique, More on P. Oxy. LXI 4096, Mythographus Homericus.
